arts.ttl: 'We made hard work of it!' - Norwich fans react to Watford win
arts.sum: Watch Norwich City fans react to the Canaries' 1-0 Championship win over Watford at Vicarage Road.

arts.ttl: Championship: Argyle stun Baggies while Norwich turn heat up on Cleverley
arts.sum: Ryan Hardie comes off bench to score twice in 2-1 win Ten-man Watford lose; nine-man Bristol City earn draw Relegation-threatened Plymouth Argyle came from behind to upset promotion hopefuls West Bromwich Albion with a 2-1 win at Home Park. The substitute striker Ryan Hardie’s late double snatched a first victory under their new manager, Miron Muslic, and ended a 15-match winless league streak stretching back to 1 November. Plymouth gave debuts to their new record signing Maksym Talovierov and fellow central defender Nikola Katic in a new-look back five. Talovierov made an immediate impact, playing a superb cross-field pass to Tymoteusz Puchacz, whose thumping cross sped across the face of the West Brom goalmouth. Continue reading...
How the game unfolded at Vicarage Road as Watford lost and had Vakoun Bayo sent off.

arts.ttl: Josh Sargent strike gives Norwich victory over 10-man Watford
arts.sum: Vakoun Bayo was dismissed in the first half for the Hornets.

arts.ttl: On This Day: Watford FC mural unveiled in town centre subway
arts.sum: On this day in 2022, a new Watford FC mural was officially unveiled in the town centre subway under Exchange Road.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Watford v Norwich City
arts.sum: Follow live updates and join the debate at Vicarage Road via our live matchday blog as Norwich City face Watford.

arts.ttl: 'We want a Watford way of playing and I want to be the person to create that'
arts.sum: The long-term vision is for there to be an agreed approach, for which players are then recruited.

arts.ttl: Joe Pateman: Why Josh Sargent has matured into the ideal centre forward
arts.sum: Norwich City's 5-1 rout of Swansea, while perhaps flattering, will have hopefully given Johannes Hoff Thorup’s men a much-needed confidence boost heading into today’s lunchtime clash with Watford at Vicarage Road, says fan columnist Joe Pateman.

arts.ttl: 'We're very fortunate' - Thorup, McLean and Doyle on defender's Norwich loan so far
arts.sum: Kenny McLean, Johannes Hoff Thorup and the man himself have all weighed in on Manchester City loanee Callum Doyle's Norwich City spell so far.

arts.ttl: Norwich boss outlines Crnac improvement plan
arts.sum: The right balance between game time and training is the key to improvement for Norwich City's Ante Crnac, according to Johannes Hoff Thorup.
